GSD.description:
KVM: SVM: fix panic on out-of-bounds guest IRQ

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit a6ffdebfb6a9c2ffeed902b544b96fe67498210e. For more details please see the references link.
